title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 150.12 - Hunting and fishing permits not authorized
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 150.12 - Hunting and fishing permits not authorized

State Regulations

No Canal Corporation employee has any authority or shall be
allowed to grant any person, hunting permits or permits to fish in any of the
canals of the State or in the State reservoirs. (See section
150.11
of this

Part.)

Notes

ยง
150.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
